backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling contact submissions, rental inquiries, pricing management, and rental cost calculation with timestamp-indexed storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a Mixpanel snippet update requirement referencing frontend/index.html.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for key frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions using OKLCH color values for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point including Google Analytics, Contentsquare, Clarity, Mixpanel initialization, and Smartlook scripts in the head.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes, layout, theming, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with company info, quick links, contact details, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with navigation links, branding, and mobile menu using a Sheet component.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing authenticated/anonymous backend actors with automatic query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login state, identity loading, and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching pricing and performing mutations like rental cost calculation, contact form submission, and rental inquiry submission via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with extensive theme variables for light and dark modes, including PS5-themed color tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that initializes React, sets up React Query, and wraps the app with the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with sections describing the serviceâ€™s mission, features, and rental policies using styled cards and PS5-themed gradients.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation and backend submission, plus static contact info displayed with UI components.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds the homepage with a hero section and rental categories, guiding users to rentals or more info via navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/RentalsPage.tsx: React page for selecting rental items, calculating estimated cost, and submitting a rental inquiry via backend hooks with validation and confirmation UI.
frontend/src/utils/contentsquareVerifica: Utility that checks if the Contentsquare tracking script exists and loaded successfully using DOM and Performance API, logging warnings or success.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, animations, plugins, and content paths.
project_state.json: JSON file describing the project's state, architecture notes, analytics requirements, and documented existing features.
